attributes.action: Scrap the MTAS medical recruitment process and return to a CV and reference-based application process
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is not a doctor in the country at any level that has any confidence in the MTAS application process. As a result, many consultants are already boycotting the interview process while others despair that they are not allowed to consider candidates they would hire immediately if free to choose. Seldom has a policy managed to create such a number of losers without apparently a single winner. As hospitals contemplate being unable to treat patients in August and the best of our doctors queue to leave the country, it's time to act before it's too late.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
